title: Software Engineering Intern
responsibilities: Collaborated on a status dashboard for Incident Management, achieving a 40% reduction in incident resolution time.
Integrated role-based authentication using Keycloak for secure access control and incident history and report features to enhance tracking and management of incidents.

Revamped and maintained details pages for 10+ cloud services, including Lbaas (Load Balancer as a Service), Vmaas (Virtual Machine as a Service), and Caas (Containers as a Service), enhancing the visibility and management of these services.
Monitored and resolved end-to-end (e2e) test failures on a daily basis, ensuring high-quality software delivery and stability.
Collaborated with stakeholders to gather and analyze requirements for new features, ensuring alignment with business needs.
